channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for GA

item.title: Report E-2024090029
item.description:
Report E-2024090029

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-05T09:13:49+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-21
  • City: ELLENWOOD
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On August 21, 2024, one (1) 5-gallon pail of adhesives was crushed in transit and released approximately one (1) quart to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Hull's Environmental Services (HES) to remediate the impacted site. HES personnel utilized absorbent pads and cleaners to remediate the impacted site. All impacted materials were collected in one (1) 55-gallon drum, while the damaged pail was containerized in one (1) additional 55-gallon drum for disposal.

item.title: Report E-2024080737
item.description:
Report E-2024080737

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-02T09:14:51+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-20
  • City: ELLENWOOD
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On August 20, 2024, one (1) 55-gallon drum of UN3264 was crushed in transit and released approximately seven (7) gallons of product to the trailer interior and pavement below. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Hull's Environmental Services (HES) to remediate the impacted site. HES personnel utilized various absorbents and hand tools to remediate the site. All impacted materials were containerized in one (1) 55-gallon drum, and the damaged drum was containerized in one (1) 95-gallon overpack.
